[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Function: new_with_signature()] [Author Spoofing] Does new_with_signature() validate that the provided signature was actually created by the specified author, or can any validator provide any signature claiming to be from any author? [File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Function: new_with_signature()] [Type Confusion] Could an attacker provide a signature that is valid BLS12-381 but signed over different data, and would this be caught before aggregation or could it cause verification failures later? [File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Function: author()] [Race Condition] Can the author field be modified after CommitVote creation through interior mutability, causing author() to return different values at different times? (High)
